letters.description: Establish a clear and focused intention for the sound bath session, considering the client's needs and desired outcomes.
Attune to the client's energetic field and observe their initial reactions to the sounds, identifying areas of tension or resistance.
Skillfully guide the sound frequencies to address identified imbalances, using specific instruments and techniques to promote relaxation and healing.
Facilitate the client's integration of the sound bath experience through grounding techniques, mindful awareness, and processing any emotions that arise.
Empower the client with tools and practices to sustain the benefits of the sound bath and cultivate long-term wellbeing through sound and self-care.
